explanation: [0-0] A woman in a black top and a yellow skirt is standing on a grassy area, leaning forward. To her left and behind her, there are many trees and buildings. On the road in front of her, there are several pedestrians.

[0-2] The woman runs from the grass to the embankment at the end of the road and jumps off it, landing with her right foot. After landing, she supports herself with both hands on the embankment and looks into the water. Beside the embankment stand a man in a yellow shirt and blue jeans, a woman in a white dress, and a man in a white shirt and grey pants.

Beside the embankment stand a man in a yellow shirt and blue jeans, a woman in a white dress, and a man in a white shirt and grey pants.

[2-10] The woman in the black top then runs back to the grassy area beside her and takes off her shoes. She runs again from the grass to the embankment at the end of the road. The man in the yellow shirt stops the woman, who is placing her foot on the embankment, and another man in a white shirt also runs over. The camera zooms in as the phone of the man in the yellow shirt falls to the ground. The woman in the black top and the man in the white shirt look ahead, while the man in the yellow shirt covers his head with his left hand.
